help.page: This page displays all hosts known to the Avalanche Deployment System. You can see the host name, jump to log files or the setting page. In the "active" view you can also see a host's SmartFrog status and the most recent message. To add a host, simply click on "Add a host" at the top of this page. In order to make hosts available for further deployment, please click "Ignite selected hosts" at the bottom of this page. There you can also delete hosts, stop SmartFrog on selected nodes and open the management console (only available when connected to Avalanche as localhost).
All listed properties of a host can be changed here. To change other settings, just click the buttons on right.
This page displays all modules that are ready for deployment on registered nodes.

This page shows you the messages sent via XMPP/Jabber by the machines known to Avalanche. Depending on the view, you either see a host list with the most recent messages of those host listed, or a you see a history of all messages received from a specific host. To stay tuned for updates, RSS feeds are available for both views.
This page displays the error message in case of a serious error. Please try again. If the problem persists, please contact your system administrator. Sorry for any inconvinence.
